## Checklist

- [ ] **Design summary included** — one-sentence summary and link to spec/plan if applicable
- [ ] **Tests added/updated** — unit, contract, integration/E2E where applicable
- [ ] **Performance** — benchmarks added or updated for performance-sensitive paths; CI bench gates pass
- [ ] **Observability** — structured logs/metrics/traces added for new behavior
- [ ] **Security & Privacy** — reviewed and checklist items (hashing, masking) applied
- [ ] **Migration & Rollback** — for large or breaking changes include a rollback plan and one-week probation monitoring steps
- [ ] **Reviewers assigned** — include 1 reviewer, 2 required for cross-cutting changes
- [ ] **Constitution check** — CI `Check Constitution Compliance` must pass (this runs automatically on PR)

## Contributor Agreement

- [ ] I confirm I have signed the [Contributor License Agreement](https://github.com/overleaf/overleaf/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#contributor-license-agreement)
